headline: Is Baxter’s Sell-off an Opportunity for Long-Term Investors?
summary: Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX) is one of the most undervalued and overlooked large-cap stocks. On August 4, a Barclays analyst lowered his price target on Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX) to $36 from $41, while maintaining an Overweight rating. The cut followed a sharp 24% decline in the stock after Q2 results, driven by the pause of […]
